Html:
First of all I should admit that I am poor in VC++.

I am trying to create an application using MVVM pattern in which the View is in WPF and the ViewModel is in VC++ and in doing so I need use DelegateCommand inside the VC++ class. I am finding it difficult to use this with generics. Can someone help me out with this?

Regards,

Sbalak

Hi Sbalak,

Perhaps you could find this article useful. I’ve also created a sample application in which there is an example of using a DelegateCommand with generics inside a VC++ class. You can download it here.

As this is not strictly related to Prism, you might get better support in the Visual C++ forums.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
